Straight Shot enters the room with Talon and is careful not to wake Elita. =
 She smiles while looking to Nightlight and the cub.

" I can just see it n=
ow, all of us together, watching the young bots develop Their skills togeth=
er..  Elita would really love ta have someone ta pal around with.  I bet in=
 the near future that will happen.  And Nightlight, don't worry, Ticson is =
out there looking for Wheelie and I bet he'll find Rodimus too.  I got ta t=
hinking about things and I realized that the shell program was long since g=
one a while ago.   I bet that Dark Rodimus is a copy of the real Rodimus.  =
And if they're out there, Tucson will find them.  Isn't that right, Talon?"=


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

od!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of the group. While

s tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad and massive,

he appearance of great size and ferocity.

> POLAR CLAW turned to look at=
 NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know
> Tuscon better than we." There =
was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at
> a PADD he had in his hand, it is =
ohviously the notes and mission
> parameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.

> "He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he was going off in the

ction of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose to be." There was

ause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wheelie took as

AR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we

of that place shows it is a dense jungle, his inhanced senses

lp him much there. What tactic do you think he will use to
